TEXT.TITLE: COCA-COLA <KO> EXECUTIVE RESIGNS
TEXT.BODY: Coca-Cola Co said Eugene V. Amoroso has resigned as president and chief executive officer of its Coca-Cola Foods division to pursue other business interests. The company said Harry E. Teasley Jr., who had headed its bottling subsidiary serving southern England, will succeed Amoroso. Reuter
